DESCRIPTION: #yGems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site.
A card in Stasis stays there for amount of turns equal to its cost plus #b1. NL When exits, it is returned to your hand and costs #b0 until played.
Gems can be placed into #ySockets in cards at a Rest Site. Cannot be #yUpgraded.
#yStance. NL Gain #b10 #yBlock when entering Defensive Mode. NL While in Defensive Mode, you have #b3 #yThorns, gain #b10 #yBlock at the start of your turn, and your Block does not expire.
Reduce the turn counter of the right-most card in #yStasis by #b1.
0-cost #yExhausting #ySkill that generates three cards inspired by a chosen Construct of the Spire, and reduces their cost by #b1 for this combat.
When this card's #yStasis turn counter is reduced...
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Reduce the HP loss required to trigger Mode Shift by X.
Remove an upgrade from a card.
